trans-unit.source: Defines a specialized text run that is used to mark a range of hidden characters.
trans-unit.target: Define uma execução de texto especializado usada para marcar um intervalo de caracteres ocultos.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" /> buffer.
trans-unit.target: O número de caracteres no buffer <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" /> class using a specified character length.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" /> usando um comprimento de caracteres especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" /> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência ao buffer de caracteres <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the character length of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" /> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento de caracteres do buffer de caracteres <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> object that represents the length of the character buffer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> objeto que representa o comprimento do buffer de caractere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of properties shared by every text character of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" /> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de propriedades compartilhadas por todos os caracteres de texto do buffer de caracteres <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextHidden" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value that represents the properties shared by every text character.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> valor que representa as propriedades compartilhadas por todos os caracteres de texto.
